meanings.definition: The perpendicular distance from the center of a regular polygon to a side.
meanings.sent1: The apothem of the hexagon was easy to calculate.
meanings.sent2: The apothem helps determine the polygon's area.
meanings.sent3: The apothem went on strike, tired of always being perpendicular.
meanings.sent4: The apothem stood tall like a ruler measuring the polygon.
meanings.sent5: The apothem was like a bridge connecting the center to the side.

meanings.definition: A straight line from the center to the midpoint of a side of a regular polygon.
meanings.sent1: She drew the apothem carefully from the center to the midpoint.
meanings.sent2: The apothem bisects the side of the polygon.
meanings.sent3: The apothem and the side had a race to the midpoint.
meanings.sent4: The apothem was like a guide leading from the center to the side.
meanings.sent5: The apothem was as straight as an arrow pointing to the midpoint.
